I tried doing this I specify a setup.py files with py_modules that I need but when I run in the console it just finishes immediately and I don't know where the .whl file is or whether it has been created at all! I described the issue on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60763128/uploadingpythonmodulesaspythonwheels
